info.name: Ad Populum
info.attribution: Implementation, assets and scripting are by Mitchell Stolycia and are released via CC BY 4.0.
info.description:
Eight contestants enter the house. Over the course of five weeks, the least popular are publicly voted out until only three remain.

This... is Ad Populum.
info.helpText:
Players (you!) will always be referred to as "players".

Cards representing the contestants in the house and the ghost which haunts it are referred to as "people" or a "person".

Setup
  1. Take your seats.
  2. Press the Setup button.
  3. Choose the type of setup you would like.
    • If a custom setup of person cards is desired, drag the cards you would like to the eight red-bordered holders before clicking setup.
  4. Any cards not used will still be present and visible, in case you want to setup again.
Your turn
To play, drag cards from your hand (bottom right) to the board.

Bets are placed by dragging the five betting chips from next to your seat to the play area.

To make a secret bet, drag a card onto the table and place a betting chip on top of it.
End turn
End your turn by clicking End turn. This will refill your hand to eight cards automatically.
Scoring
Scoring only occurs at the end of the game. Do this manually by using the counters by your seats.
Misc.
The red X cards are used to represent a person who has been voted off the show (has the least popularity at the end of a round).

The Draw 3 cards person ability has to be executed manually by dragging three cards from the deck to your hand.

champion.jpg 0,0.ab: In phase 3, you can discard people still in play

champion.jpg 0,1.ab: Discard a visible person from this row (different column)

champion.jpg 0,2.ab: Add one of these cards from a previous row to your hand

champion.jpg 0,4.ab: Take 3 cards from someone and keep 1

champion.jpg 0,5.ab: Choose a player and card type. They must give you one of them cards

champion.jpg 0,6.ab: Swap two visible cards in a person's column

champion.jpg 0,9.ab: Place a bet on any person in any row (not the 5 VP row)

champion.jpg 1,1.ab: Place half of another player's hand face down on the table

champion.jpg 1,2.ab: Play a second card (only once per turn)

objects.value: Play anywhere without ability. Next card here also has no ability

dog.ab: Retrieve a visible card to your hand. Discard this card

spade.ab: Secret bets on a named person must be revealed. Discard this

clickRoutine.note: Check that the user really wants to set up a fresh game

fields.text: Are you sure you want to erase any progress and start a new game?

clickRoutine.header: Would you like random people cards or to choose your self?

thenRoutine.note: Check that the user has laid out cards
thenRoutine.header: Have you laid out the people cards?

fields.text: Make sure the people cards of your choice have been laid out in the eight red-bordered holders at the top of the play area before continuing. Place the remaining six cards back in the holder

clickRoutine.note: move each seat into the DEFAULT collection
for each widget (seat) in the default collection...

thenRoutine.header: You need at least two players to play this game.

fields.text: The game may function incorrectly if you choose to continue.
